message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand that $100 is a good price for you, but I'm still looking to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $110. It's a fair compromise, and I think you'll still get a great deal.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $105?
